subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Who will emerge to supplant Tiger Woods as the world’s No. 1 golfer? The usual answer is that we have not yet heard his name, or, if we have, it has not rung a bell.
snippet: Who will emerge to supplant Tiger Woods as the world’s No. 1 golfer? The usual answer is that we have not yet heard his name, or, if we have, it has not rung a bell.
